action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

#sudo sed -i 's/ident/md5/g' /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf
sudo sed -i '/127.0.0.1\/32/d' /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf
sudo sed -i '/::1\/128/d' /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t 127.0.0.1/32 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t ::1/128 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf

sudo systemctl restart postgresql-9.6

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo -i -u postgres psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE netbox;'
sudo -i -u postgres createuser -d -E -R -S netbox
sudo -i -u postgres psql -c "alter user netbox with encrypted password '@@{NETBOX_PG_PASSWORD}@@'; "
sudo -i -u postgres psql -c "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE netbox TO netbox; "

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /opt/netbox
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install -r requirements.txt
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install napalm django-rq
cd netbox/netbox/
sudo cp configuration.example.py configuration.py

sudo sed -i "s#ALLOWED_HOSTS = \[\]#ALLOWED_HOSTS = \['@@{NETBOX_DNS}@@', '@@{address}@@'\]#" configuration.py
sudo sed -i "s#    'USER': '',#    'USER': 'netbox',#" configuration.py
sudo sed -i "0,/PASSWORD/{s#    'PASSWORD': '',#    'PASSWORD': '@@{NETBOX_PG_PASSWORD}@@',#}" configuration.py
sudo sed -i '/SECRET_KEY/d' configuration.py
echo "SECRET_KEY = '$(../generate_secret_key.py)'" | sudo tee -a configuration.py
sudo sed -i 's/WEBHOOKS_ENABLED = False/WEBHOOKS_ENABLED = True/' configuration.py

cd /opt/netbox/netbox/
python3 manage.py migrate
echo "from django.contrib.auth.models import User; User.objects.create_superuser('@@{NETBOX_USERNAME}@@', 'admin@example.com', '@@{NETBOX_PASSWORD}@@')" | python3 manage.py shell
sudo python3 manage.py collectstatic --no-input
python3 manage.py loaddata initial_data

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install gunicorn
echo "command = '/usr/local/bin/gunicorn'
pythonpath = '/opt/netbox/netbox'
bind = '127.0.0.1:8001'
workers = 3
user = 'nginx'" | sudo tee -a /opt/netbox/gunicorn_config.py

echo "[program:netbox]
command = /usr/local/bin/gunicorn -c /opt/netbox/gunicorn_config.py netbox.wsgi
directory = /opt/netbox/netbox/
user = nginx

[program:netbox-rqworker]
command = python3 /opt/netbox/netbox/manage.py rqworker
directory = /opt/netbox/netbox/
user = nginx" | sudo tee -a /etc/supervisord.d/netbox.ini

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y --quiet openldap-devel
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install django-auth-ldap

cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep -v nameserver > resolv.conf
echo "nameserver @@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@" >> resolv.conf
grep nameserver /etc/resolv.conf >> resolv.conf
sudo mv resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

echo 'import ldap

AUTH_LDAP_SERVER_URI = "ldap://@@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@:389"

AUTH_LDAP_CONNECTION_OPTIONS = {
    ldap.OPT_REFERRALS: 0
}

AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN}@@"
AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD}@@"

LDAP_IGNORE_CERT_ERRORS = True

from django_auth_ldap.config import LDAPSearch

AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH = LDAPSearch("@@{AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH}@@",ldap.SCOPE_SUBTREE,"(sAMAccountName=%(user)s)")


AUTH_LDAP_USER_ATTR_MAP = {
    "first_name": "givenName",
    "last_name": "sn",
    "email": "mail"
}' | sudo tee -a /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/ldap_config.py

action_list.description:
Enable LDAP Auth (Optional)
`LDAP_SERVER_IP` : AD/LDAP server IP.
`AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN` : The distinguished name to use when binding to the LDAP server.
`AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD` : The password to use with `AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN`.
`AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH` : An LDAPSearch object that will locate a user in the directory.
action_list.name: LDAP Auth

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex 

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo yum update --quiet -y
#sudo sed -i s/^SELINUX=.*$/SELINUX=disabled/ /etc/selinux/config
sudo setsebool -P httpd_can_network_connect 1 #enable http connections through network

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi epel-release
sudo yum install -y --quiet gcc python36 python36-devel python36-setuptools libxml2-devel libxslt-devel libffi-devel graphviz openssl-devel redhat-rpm-config redis nginx supervisor
sudo easy_install-3.6 pip

sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/pgsql
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate
sudo vgcreate postgresdata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n postgresdata_lvm postgresdata
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm
echo -e "/dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm \t /var/lib/pgsql \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo systemctl stop nginx supervisord 
sudo systemctl enable nginx supervisord

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/9.6/redhat/rhel-7-x86_64/pgdg-centos96-9.6-3.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y postgresql96 postgresql96-server postgresql96-devel
sudo /usr/pgsql-9.6/bin/postgresql96-setup initdb

sudo systemctl start postgresql-9.6 redis
sudo systemctl enable postgresql-9.6 redis

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

NETBOX_URL="@@{NETBOX_URL}@@"

curl -C - -L -O --retry 6 --retry-max-time 60 --retry-delay 60 --silent --show-error $NETBOX_URL
sudo tar -zxvf v*.tar.gz -C /opt
sudo ln -s /opt/netbox-*/ /opt/netbox

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

sudo sed -i '/::1\/128/d' /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t 127.0.0.1/32 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf
echo -e "host \t all \t all \t ::1/128 \t md5" | sudo tee -a /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf

sudo systemctl restart postgresql-9.6

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo -i -u postgres psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE netbox;'
sudo -i -u postgres createuser -d -E -R -S netbox
sudo -i -u postgres psql -c "alter user netbox with encrypted password '@@{NETBOX_PG_PASSWORD}@@'; "
sudo -i -u postgres psql -c "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE netbox TO netbox; "

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /opt/netbox
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install -r requirements.txt
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install napalm django-rq
cd netbox/netbox/
sudo cp configuration.example.py configuration.py

sudo sed -i "s#ALLOWED_HOSTS = \[\]#ALLOWED_HOSTS = \['@@{NETBOX_DNS}@@', '@@{address}@@'\]#" configuration.py
sudo sed -i "s#    'USER': '',#    'USER': 'netbox',#" configuration.py
sudo sed -i "0,/PASSWORD/{s#    'PASSWORD': '',#    'PASSWORD': '@@{NETBOX_PG_PASSWORD}@@',#}" configuration.py
sudo sed -i '/SECRET_KEY/d' configuration.py
echo "SECRET_KEY = '$(../generate_secret_key.py)'" | sudo tee -a configuration.py
sudo sed -i 's/WEBHOOKS_ENABLED = False/WEBHOOKS_ENABLED = True/' configuration.py

cd /opt/netbox/netbox/
python3 manage.py migrate
echo "from django.contrib.auth.models import User; User.objects.create_superuser('@@{NETBOX_USERNAME}@@', 'admin@example.com', '@@{NETBOX_PASSWORD}@@')" | python3 manage.py shell
sudo python3 manage.py collectstatic --no-input
python3 manage.py loaddata initial_data

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install gunicorn
echo "command = '/usr/local/bin/gunicorn'
pythonpath = '/opt/netbox/netbox'
bind = '127.0.0.1:8001'
workers = 3
user = 'nginx'" | sudo tee -a /opt/netbox/gunicorn_config.py

echo "[program:netbox]
command = /usr/local/bin/gunicorn -c /opt/netbox/gunicorn_config.py netbox.wsgi
directory = /opt/netbox/netbox/
user = nginx

[program:netbox-rqworker]
command = python3 /opt/netbox/netbox/manage.py rqworker
directory = /opt/netbox/netbox/
user = nginx" | sudo tee -a /etc/supervisord.d/netbox.ini

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y --quiet openldap-devel
sudo /usr/local/bin/pip3 install django-auth-ldap

cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep -v nameserver > resolv.conf
echo "nameserver @@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@" >> resolv.conf
grep nameserver /etc/resolv.conf >> resolv.conf
sudo mv resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

echo 'import ldap

AUTH_LDAP_SERVER_URI = "ldap://@@{LDAP_SERVER_IP}@@:389"

AUTH_LDAP_CONNECTION_OPTIONS = {
    ldap.OPT_REFERRALS: 0
}

AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN}@@"
AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD = "@@{AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD}@@"

LDAP_IGNORE_CERT_ERRORS = True

from django_auth_ldap.config import LDAPSearch

AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH = LDAPSearch("@@{AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH}@@",ldap.SCOPE_SUBTREE,"(sAMAccountName=%(user)s)")


AUTH_LDAP_USER_ATTR_MAP = {
    "first_name": "givenName",
    "last_name": "sn",
    "email": "mail"
}' | sudo tee -a /opt/netbox/netbox/netbox/ldap_config.py

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

guest_customization.cloud_init:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

action_list.description:
Enable LDAP Auth (Optional)
`LDAP_SERVER_IP` : AD/LDAP server IP.
`AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN` : The distinguished name to use when binding to the LDAP server.
`AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD` : The password to use with `AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN`.
`AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH` : An LDAPSearch object that will locate a user in the directory.
action_list.name: LDAP Auth

action_list.description:
Enable LDAP Auth (Optional)
`LDAP_SERVER_IP` : AD/LDAP server IP.
`AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN` : The distinguished name to use when binding to the LDAP server.
`AUTH_LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD` : The password to use with `AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN`.
`AUTH_LDAP_USER_SEARCH` : An LDAPSearch object that will locate a user in the directory.
action_list.name: LDAP Auth

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex 

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo yum update --quiet -y
#sudo sed -i s/^SELINUX=.*$/SELINUX=disabled/ /etc/selinux/config
sudo setsebool -P httpd_can_network_connect 1 #enable http connections through network

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi epel-release
sudo yum install -y --quiet gcc python36 python36-devel python36-setuptools libxml2-devel libxslt-devel libffi-devel graphviz openssl-devel redhat-rpm-config redis nginx supervisor
sudo easy_install-3.6 pip

sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/pgsql
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate
sudo vgcreate postgresdata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n postgresdata_lvm postgresdata
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm
echo -e "/dev/postgresdata/postgresdata_lvm \t /var/lib/pgsql \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo systemctl stop nginx supervisord 
sudo systemctl enable nginx supervisord

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum install -y https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/9.6/redhat/rhel-7-x86_64/pgdg-centos96-9.6-3.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y postgresql96 postgresql96-server postgresql96-devel
sudo /usr/pgsql-9.6/bin/postgresql96-setup initdb

sudo systemctl start postgresql-9.6 redis
sudo systemctl enable postgresql-9.6 redis

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

NETBOX_URL="@@{NETBOX_URL}@@"

curl -C - -L -O --retry 6 --retry-max-time 60 --retry-delay 60 --silent --show-error $NETBOX_URL
sudo tar -zxvf v*.tar.gz -C /opt
sudo ln -s /opt/netbox-*/ /opt/netbox
